concept.title: Replicating Streams
concept.shortdesc: When you can pass data from a stage to multiple stages, the source stage passes all data to all connected stages. You can configure the logic for connected stages to discard different records, as with Required Fields, but all records are passed by default.

conbody.p: pipelinesreplicating streamsreplicatingstreams in a pipelineUse a Stream Selector to separate and route data based on conditions.
